mapper.insert: insert into tb_ad_category (ad_category_id, category_name, groupname, code, status, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, is_delete, bak1, bak2, bak3) values (#{adCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
